field.name: format
field.label: Format as HTML:
field.description: Prepare the content as HTML. If no, then plain text. Enter your subscription group templates in the appropriate box.

field.name: prepare_content
field.label: Prepare Content:
field.description: Optionally prepare the content with the Joomla content plugins. Only works with HTML format.

field.name: category
field.label: Categories:
field.description: Select one or more categories to which to send notifications to this group's Address(es).

field.name: address
field.label: To:
field.description: Email address(es) to receive notifications for this group's Categories. Comma-separated if multiple.

field.name: htmltemplate
field.label: HTML Template:
field.description: Enter the HTML layout for messages sent to this group's Address. Insert [LINK] where you want the link to the article to appear.

field.name: texttemplate
field.label: Text Template:
field.description: Enter the layout for messages sent to this group's Address. Insert [LINK] where you want the link to the article to appear.
